meanings.definition: A person who travels in a caravan.
meanings.sent1: The caravanners set up camp by the lake.
meanings.sent2: We met friendly caravanners at the national park.
meanings.sent3: The caravanners had a race to see who could set up their tents the fastest.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of tents, the caravanners stood out like colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The caravanners' laughter filled the air as they shared stories around the campfire.

meanings.sent1: Many caravanners enjoy exploring new destinations together.
meanings.sent2: The group of caravanners planned a trip to the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The caravanners organized a potluck dinner under the stars.
meanings.sent4: Like a flock of birds, the caravanners moved in unison along the highway.
meanings.sent5: The caravanners' camaraderie made the journey even more enjoyable.
